document.full_text: president barack obama called ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara on tuesday to congratulate him on assuming his duties and offer support for efforts to unite the country and restore security, the white house said.
document.title: obama offers support to ivory coast leader ouattara
lines_and_colors: president barack obama called ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara on tuesday to congratulate him on assuming his duties and offer support for efforts to unite the country and restore security, the white house said.
